mapper.select: select l.*, m.user_id as "reporter", w.user_id as "writer" from police l join member m on l.user_no=m.user_no join (select p.p_no, m.user_id from police p join solution s on p.solution_no=s.solution_no join member m on s.user_no = m.user_no) w on l.p_no = w.p_no order by create_date DESC
